query:
UPDATE smtp_credentials cred
            SET description = $1
            FROM projects p
            WHERE cred.id = $2
              AND cred.project_id = p.id
              AND cred.project_id = $3
              AND p.organization_id = $4
            RETURNING
                cred.id,
                cred.updated_at,
                cred.project_id,
                cred.created_at,
                '' AS "password_hash!",
                cred.description,
                cred.username
